title: Lidded Bowl and Dish (Écuelle ronde et plateau rond)
description: Lidded Bowl and Dish (Écuelle ronde et plateau rond); Vincennes Porcelain Manufactory (French, 1740 - 1756); Vincennes, France; about 1752 - 1753; Soft-paste porcelain with bleu lapis ground color, polychrome enamel decoration and gilding; 14 x 22.2 x 16.7 cm (5 1/2 x 8 3/4 x 6 9/16 in.); 89.DE.44; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
